abstract: Hundreds of people, both ordinary and famous New Yorkers, wait in slow-moving line to pay their respects at wake for former Gov Mario M Cuomo on Upper East Side; his family, including his widow Matilda, and his sons Chris and Andrew, receive condolences from an array of dignitaries.
lead_paragraph: New Yorkers, both the famous and the ordinary, lined up outside the Frank E. Campbell funeral home on the Upper East Side of Manhattan to attend the former governor’s wake.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and MICHAEL BARBARO

snippet: New Yorkers, both the famous and the ordinary, lined up outside the Frank E. Campbell funeral home on the Upper East Side of Manhattan to attend the former governor’s wake.

headline.main: Mourners Pay Their Respects to Mario Cuomo
headline.print_headline: Mourners Pay Their Respects to Mario Cuomo
